alert.note: Alert for Hendry (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 30 at 3:45PM EDT by NWS Miami
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Collier and southeastern Hendry Counties through 430 PM EDT... At 344 PM EDT, National Weather Service meteorologists were tracking a strong thunderstorm near Hendry Correctional, or 15 miles southeast of Ave Maria, moving northwest at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Ave Maria, Immokalee, Hendry Correctional, Big Cypress National Preserve, Bunker Hill and Sunniland. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: These winds can down small tree limbs and branches, and blow around unsecured small objects. Seek shelter in a safe building until the storm passes. Excessive cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
